thoughts.text: I think I should get the text summary of a website related to my code to see if there are any insights or information that could help me improve my code.
thoughts.reasoning: Getting the text summary of a website related to my code will allow me to quickly identify any insights or information that could be relevant to improving my code, without having to read through the entire website.
thoughts.plan:
- Get the text summary of a website related to my code
- Look for insights or information that could help me to improve my code
- Implement any changes that I think will be beneficial
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am not relying too heavily on the text summary and that I am still using my own judgement to determine what changes will be beneficial.
thoughts.speak: I think I should get the text summary of a website related to my code to see if there are any insights or information that could help me improve my code.
